articles.author: Christopher Ingraham
articles.title: Air pollution outdoors can make you worse at your desk job
articles.description: Poor outdoor air quality is likely to have a negative impact on your job performance, even if you work indoors at a desk, according to a new working paper from researchers at Germany's Leibniz University and the Columbia Business School. For years, researcher…
